attributes.action: Change to the laws surrounding child arrangement orders to be more clear.
attributes.additional_details:
For example a child arrangement order now will state... no direct or indirect contact. 
This needs to be amended. It should have things in that state the parent with no contact can not steal pictures of the child. Can not share pictures of the child. Can not like pictures of the child. Having no contact but being able to distribute pictures of said child should be a part of the arrangement.
attributes.background: To have clear guidelines set out in each individual child arrangement order. To set out what exactly is allowed and not allowed. To protect the children even more than it is now.

rejection.details: Decisions about child arrangement orders are a matter for the courts, not the UK Government or Parliament.
